title: Second round on 25 august
content: PESSAT second round is on 25th august and the site mentions that the classes will commence in august so considering this when can the bootstrap and all start?

comments.body: hope they start within 3-4 days cause its already so late

Usually, bootstrap takes place on the first Monday about a week after 2nd round and normal classes begin right after bootstrap. They might either reduce the number of days between 2nd round and bootstrap, or reduce the number of days in bootstrap, or both.

Bro kcet counselling may get delayed by 3-4 days 
(Initially round 1 results were supposed to be held on 21st may get pushed to 24th ish) 
Does pessat 2nd round have to be on a sunday 
Or has it ever been conducted on a weekday?

So there are chances of pessat round 2 getting conducted in the first week of sept 
If kcet gets pushed to 24th/25th
